Name: Memoria
Author: Albeoris
Description:
This is a small modification that makes gameplay of Final Fantasy I (PR), Final Fantasy II (PR), Final Fantasy III (PR), Final Fantasy IV (PR), Final Fantasy V (PR) and Final Fantasy VI (PR) more enjoyable.
___

**Features**:
- Increase game speed (Default Key: F1).
- Disable encounters (Default Key: F2).
- Use quick save and load (Default Keys: (Release) F5 and F9, (Current) Alt+F5, Alt+F9).
- Highlight interactive objects and hidden passages (Default key: Caps Lock [Toggle or Hold])
- Switch to Turn-based ATB Combat
- Color used words and items
- Export, edit and import graphics and text resources (like characteristics of enemies) (Export disabled by default)
- Partial modification of CSV and TXT resources
___
**Configuration**:
1. Start the game first.
1. Wait, the first launch will take some time. (about 1 minute)
1. Features that are enabled by default (for example, increasing the speed of the game) will already work.
1. Close the game and edit the configuration file $GameFolder$\BepInEx\config\Memoria.FFPR\$Section$.cfg
